::Spears::

"That's icredable.  You actualy came back.  Well, it counts for 
anything, I'm glad you did make it back."

She kept walking. She knew he'd probable find out sonner or later. I 
might as well tell him now than letting him find out later on, she 
thought to herself.

"I was a Pred before I changed sides." she hated hearing the words 
come out of her mouth.  She would have rather swallowed poison before 
tasting those words. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Forgot to include this in my last post.
> 
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> "Next thing I remember is waking up in a CR chamber, but I had 
died," Ramulus 
> shruggs, "As close as the computer reported, my body was put into 
the CR 
> chamber, and, after several weeks, a power surge summoned my spark 
back."
